pullrequest.title: use CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR in pkg-config example test in case an arch-dependent lib folder is used

content.raw: It seems that `ign-cmake`'s value for `CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR` includes the architecture, so it ends up being `lib/x86_64-linux-gnu`, but the example projects are getting a value of just `lib` for `CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR`. In both cases, the value of that variable should be getting set by calling `include(GNUInstallDirs)`, so I'm not sure what could cause the inconsistency.
